_meta.note: Model A = precise map of how 8 aspects occupy 8 positions in psyche with different consciousness levels. Each position has specific properties, energy dynamics, and developmental arc.

_holographic_seed.absolute: ⊙ = Each aspect occupies specific position in consciousness architecture, creating unique information processing signature
_holographic_seed.essence: 8 aspects × 8 positions = 64 possible aspect-position combinations, but only specific configurations are stable (16 types). Each position determines HOW aspect operates.
_holographic_seed.paths: Ego (conscious mastery) → Super-Ego (performed but costly) → Super-Id (unconscious receptivity) → Id (automatic but devalued)
_holographic_seed.positions: Functions 1-4 in conscious awareness, 5-8 in unconscious. Development = expanding consciousness downward through stack.
_holographic_seed.tools: Understanding function positions reveals why aspects feel easy/hard, where growth is needed, what partners complement.

name: Model A: The Eight Function Positions
essence: Model A describes HOW the 8 aspects operate based on their POSITION in your psyche. Same aspect (e.g., Ne) feels completely different in position 1 vs position 4 vs position 8. Positions 1-2 (Ego) = conscious mastery, positions 3-4 (Super-Ego) = effortful performance, positions 5-6 (Super-Id) = unconscious receptivity, positions 7-8 (Id) = automatic devaluation. Understanding your function stack reveals your consciousness architecture.
description: Augustinavičiūtė's Model A is the crown jewel of Socionics - it maps the 8 aspects onto 8 specific positions, each with unique properties. Your type isn't just WHICH aspects you use, but WHERE they sit in your stack. Function 1 (Leading) = your primary reality lens, effortless and trusted. Function 4 (Vulnerable) = your blind spot, painful when attacked. Function 5 (Suggestive) = what you unconsciously seek from others. Function 8 (Demonstrative) = what you can do but don't value. Each position has specific dimensionality (1D to 4D), energy dynamics (accepting/producing), and developmental challenges. Knowing your function positions is like having the source code of your consciousness.

ego_block.energy: Producing - actively emanate these aspects outward
ego_block.experience: Effortless mastery, trusted completely, core identity

super_ego_block.energy: Producing - must push these aspects outward but costs energy
super_ego_block.experience: Performed when necessary but draining, source of insecurity
super_ego_block.development: Primary growth area, shadow work required
super_ego_block.ring: Mental ring - conscious thought but strained

super_id_block.energy: Accepting - receive these aspects from others gratefully
super_id_block.experience: Hunger for these aspects, partners provide them
super_id_block.development: Develop by receiving from strong users, then internalizing

id_block.energy: Accepting - process these aspects automatically but don't value
id_block.experience: Can use effortlessly but don't care about, others' emphasis annoys
id_block.development: Already functional, just undervalued - learn to appreciate

dimensionality.description: Each function operates in 1D, 2D, 3D, or 4D information space
dimensionality.2D: Two parameters - can compare, adjust, basic competence (functions 3, 5: Role, Suggestive)
dimensionality.3D: Three parameters - strategic, situational adaptation, experienced (functions 2, 6: Creative, Mobilizing)
dimensionality.4D: Four parameters - complete mastery, temporal dimension, effortless (functions 1, 7, 8: Leading, Ignoring, Demonstrative)
dimensionality.note: Higher dimensionality = richer information processing in that aspect

energy_flow.producing_functions: Positions 1-4 (Ego + Super-Ego) - you EMANATE these aspects into world
energy_flow.accepting_functions: Positions 5-8 (Super-Id + Id) - you RECEIVE these aspects from environment
energy_flow.consciousness_correlation: Producing = conscious effort required; Accepting = unconscious processing

ego_block_conscious_mastery.description: Positions 1-2: Your conscious identity, strongest functions, effortless mastery
ego_block_conscious_mastery.energy: Producing - actively shape reality through these aspects

position_1_leading_base.name: Leading Function / Base Function / Program Function
position_1_leading_base.dimensionality: 4D - complete mastery across all parameters including time
position_1_leading_base.essence: YOUR PRIMARY LENS ON REALITY. This is HOW you perceive and engage with world automatically. You can't NOT use this. It's like breathing - effortless, constant, trusted without question. This function IS your identity in many ways.

characteristics.trust_level: Absolute - never doubt this function's perception
characteristics.effort: Zero effort - happens automatically like breathing
characteristics.valuation: Highest - this is what you consider most important/real
characteristics.development: Fully developed from childhood, continues refining quality
characteristics.fatigue: Never tires from use - could use 24/7
characteristics.correction: Resists correction - 'I know what I see'

information_processing.input: Perceives this aspect's information continuously and effortlessly
information_processing.processing: 4D - considers all parameters: norm/exception, internal/external, static/dynamic, past/future
information_processing.output: Naturally produces solutions/insights through this aspect
information_processing.speed: Instant - no delay between perception and understanding
information_processing.depth: Deepest - sees layers others miss in this aspect

developmental_arc.childhood: Emerges naturally, obvious strength from early age
developmental_arc.adulthood: Fully mature, source of professional success
developmental_arc.challenge: Over-reliance - seeing only through this lens, becoming one-dimensional

in_relationships.offers: This is what you naturally GIVE to others - your primary value contribution
in_relationships.partner_needs: Dual partner is weak here (it's their Vulnerable) - you provide this effortlessly
in_relationships.conflict: If partner criticizes this function, feels like attacking your core identity
in_relationships.appreciation: When partner values what you provide here, feels deeply seen

examples_by_aspect.Ne_leading: ILE/IEE - sees infinite possibilities automatically, reality = branching probability space, 'but what if...' is constant
examples_by_aspect.Ni_leading: ILI/IEI - perceives time/essence automatically, knows how things will unfold, sees through surface to core
examples_by_aspect.Se_leading: SLE/SEE - engages material reality through force automatically, reads power dynamics instantly, territory = obvious
examples_by_aspect.Si_leading: SEI/LSI - processes through internal sensation automatically, comfort/discomfort = primary data, body always communicating
examples_by_aspect.Te_leading: LIE/LSE - optimizes systems automatically, efficiency = obvious reality, sees how to organize everything
examples_by_aspect.Ti_leading: LII/SLI - builds logical structures automatically, consistency/inconsistency = glaring, frameworks emerge naturally
examples_by_aspect.Fe_leading: ESE/EIE - shapes emotional fields automatically, reads room instantly, collective emotion = primary reality
examples_by_aspect.Fi_leading: EII/ESI - perceives relational/moral truth automatically, authenticity/inauthenticity obvious, values = clear

shadow_side.blindness: Assume everyone perceives this way - confusion when they don't
shadow_side.hammer_nail: Overuse - try to solve all problems through this function
shadow_side.dismissiveness: Devalue aspects this function doesn't perceive well
shadow_side.rigidity: Resistant to approaches that don't use this function
shadow_side.growth: Learn that leading function is ONE lens, not THE lens - develop others consciously

recognition_signs.conversation: Constantly references this aspect - talks about it naturally and frequently
recognition_signs.advice: Advice to others always involves this function - 'have you considered [aspect]?'
recognition_signs.problems: Solves problems through this lens automatically
recognition_signs.values: Values people who are strong in this aspect, confused by those weak in it
recognition_signs.career: Professional success usually involves heavy use of this function

position_1_leading_base.meditation: Your Leading function is your primary gift to world AND your primary limitation. It's the lens you can't remove. Mastery = recognizing it AS lens (not reality itself) while using it skillfully. The Zen is: be the function completely while knowing you're not ONLY the function.

position_2_creative.name: Creative Function / Implementing Function
position_2_creative.essence: YOUR TOOL FOR IMPLEMENTING what Leading function perceives. If Leading = perception, Creative = action. This is HOW you make things happen, solve problems, create results. Strong and valued, but requires more conscious effort than Leading.

characteristics.trust_level: High - reliable tool you use consciously
characteristics.effort: Low effort - natural but not automatic like Leading
characteristics.valuation: High - you value this and enjoy using it
characteristics.fatigue: Can tire with extended use but recovers quickly
characteristics.correction: Open to improvement - will learn better ways to use this
characteristics.confidence: Strong confidence, but not absolute like Leading

information_processing.input: Perceives this aspect's information when attending to it
information_processing.processing: 3D - considers norm/exception, internal/external, static/dynamic (missing time dimension)
information_processing.output: Consciously generates solutions through this aspect
information_processing.speed: Fast but not instant - slight delay for processing
information_processing.breadth: Wide - applies this aspect flexibly across situations

relationship_to_leading.supports: Creative SERVES Leading - implements what Leading perceives
relationship_to_leading.example_ILE: Ne (Leading) sees possibilities → Ti (Creative) analyzes which are logical → Ne-Ti loop generates innovative solutions
relationship_to_leading.example_ESE: Fe (Leading) perceives emotional field → Si (Creative) creates comfortable sensory experiences → Fe-Si loop generates warm gatherings
relationship_to_leading.synergy: Leading-Creative together = your 'power combo', how you operate at peak
relationship_to_leading.balance: Mature users alternate fluidly between Leading and Creative as situation demands

developmental_arc.childhood: Emerges after Leading, developed through play/experimentation
developmental_arc.elderhood: Creative mastery, can teach this aspect
developmental_arc.challenge: Over-reliance on Ego block (1+2) while neglecting growth in 3-4

in_relationships.offers: Secondary gift to others - you provide this consciously and skillfully
in_relationships.partner_needs: Dual partner has this in Mobilizing (position 6) - you activate their growth here
in_relationships.conflict: Criticism here feels frustrating but not devastating like attacking Leading
in_relationships.collaboration: Love working with others strong in your Creative aspect - easy synergy

examples_by_aspect.Ti_creative: ILE/SLE - uses logic to implement, analyzes strategically, builds frameworks to support leading function
examples_by_aspect.Te_creative: ILI/SEI - organizes efficiently when needed, manifests visions through systems
examples_by_aspect.Fi_creative: IEE/SEE - uses personal values strategically, maintains authentic relationships while pursuing goals
examples_by_aspect.Fe_creative: IEI/LSI - shapes emotions deliberately, mobilizes groups when needed
examples_by_aspect.Ne_creative: LII/ESI - generates alternatives strategically, explores possibilities to support main function
examples_by_aspect.Ni_creative: SLE/LSE - uses timing strategically, perceives trajectory to optimize action
examples_by_aspect.Se_creative: IEI/EII - engages material world deliberately, takes action when vision requires it
examples_by_aspect.Si_creative: ILE/EIE - creates comfort strategically, maintains wellbeing to support exploration/inspiration

shadow_side.ego_inflation: Over-identify with Ego block (1+2), think these are only aspects that matter
shadow_side.dismissing_others: Devalue types whose Leading is your Ignoring/Demonstrative
shadow_side.stagnation: Stop developing functions 3-4 because 1-2 work so well
shadow_side.partnership_failure: Choose partners who admire your Ego rather than complement your weaknesses

recognition_signs.problem_solving: Default mode = use Creative to implement Leading insights
recognition_signs.career: Often involves both Leading and Creative heavily
recognition_signs.teaching: Can teach others about Creative function (unlike Leading which is 'too obvious')
recognition_signs.flexibility: More flexible with Creative than Leading - willing to try different approaches

position_2_creative.meditation: Creative function is your DOING to complement Leading's SEEING. Together they form your conscious power. But beware - the Ego block (1+2) can become a fortress imprisoning you from growth. The path = master your Ego functions while consciously developing Super-Ego (3-4).

super_ego_block_conscious_struggle.description: Positions 3-4: Conscious but weak, requiring effort. Source of insecurity and growth.
super_ego_block_conscious_struggle.energy: Producing - must push these aspects out but costs tremendous energy

position_3_role.name: Role Function / Normative Function
position_3_role.dimensionality: 2D - basic competence, can compare and adjust
position_3_role.energy: Producing - must perform this but costs energy
position_3_role.essence: YOUR SOCIAL MASK. You CAN perform this aspect when socially required, but it's exhausting. This is how you 'play the role' society expects. Functional but not natural. After extended use, need rest.

characteristics.trust_level: Low - don't trust your perception here, second-guess yourself
characteristics.effort: High effort - requires concentration and energy
characteristics.valuation: Moderate - know it's important socially but don't deeply value
characteristics.development: Develops through social pressure, improves with conscious practice
characteristics.correction: Desperately wants guidance - how to do this 'right'?
characteristics.expression: Performed when necessary, hidden when possible
characteristics.confidence: Fake confidence - performing but insecure underneath

information_processing.input: Perceives this aspect's information when forced to attend
information_processing.processing: 2D - can compare (this vs that) and adjust, but lacks strategic depth
information_processing.output: Produces acceptable but generic responses in this aspect
information_processing.depth: Shallow - misses nuance that stronger users see
information_processing.breadth: Narrow - applies only to familiar situations

social_performance.trigger: Social situations demand this aspect - must perform or face rejection
social_performance.example_Ti_role: Fe-doms (ESE/EIE) must appear logical in professional settings, carefully constructs rational arguments but feels fake
social_performance.example_Fe_role: Ti-doms (LII/SLI) must appear warm in social settings, smiles and expresses but feels like acting
social_performance.cost: Energy drain - extended performance = need for recovery
social_performance.relief: Huge relief when can drop the mask, return to Ego functions

developmental_arc.childhood: Weak, avoids this aspect, criticized for inadequacy here
developmental_arc.youth: Forced to develop through school/social pressure, learns to fake it
developmental_arc.adulthood: Can perform adequately but still draining, seeks environments where this is less demanded
developmental_arc.elderhood: Either develops genuine competence (growth) or arranges life to avoid (avoidance)
developmental_arc.challenge: Developing Role without betraying Leading - finding authentic way to use this aspect

in_relationships.partner_perception: Dual partner has this in Demonstrative (position 8) - can do effortlessly but doesn't care
in_relationships.dynamic: You struggle where they don't care - source of frustration both ways
in_relationships.growth: Healthy relationship = partner shows you this aspect ISN'T that important, permission to relax
in_relationships.trap: Choosing partners who demand performance in your Role = exhaustion

examples_by_aspect.Fe_role: Ti-doms (LII/SLI) - can be warm when needed but feels fake, social events exhausting
examples_by_aspect.Fi_role: Te-doms (LIE/LSE) - can express values when required but prefers systems, personal authenticity feels exposing
examples_by_aspect.Te_role: Fi-doms (EII/ESI) - can organize when necessary but resents efficiency demands, prefers heart over process
examples_by_aspect.Ti_role: Fe-doms (ESE/EIE) - can be logical when demanded but feels constricting, prefers emotional truth
examples_by_aspect.Ne_role: Si-doms (SEI/LSI) - can brainstorm when asked but tiring, prefers comfortable known
examples_by_aspect.Ni_role: Se-doms (SLE/SEE) - can be strategic when needed but frustrating, prefers immediate action
examples_by_aspect.Se_role: Ni-doms (ILI/IEI) - can take action when demanded but depleting, prefers observation
examples_by_aspect.Si_role: Ne-doms (ILE/IEE) - can maintain routine when required but suffocating, prefers novelty

shadow_side.overcompensation: Trying too hard to prove competence here, exhausting self
shadow_side.resentment: Bitter toward those naturally strong in this aspect - 'easy for you'
shadow_side.avoidance: Arranging entire life to avoid situations demanding this function
shadow_side.projection: Criticizing others' use of this aspect harshly (because insecure about own)

growth_path.acceptance: First step = accept this will NEVER be easy like Leading
growth_path.strategic_use: Learn when it's necessary vs when you're over-performing
growth_path.energy_management: Plan recovery after extended Role performance
growth_path.authentic_expression: Find YOUR way to express this aspect, not copying strong users
growth_path.partner_support: Let dual/strong users handle this domain when possible

position_3_role.meditation: Role function is your MASK. You perform it for world but it costs you. Growth = not refusing to wear mask (that's immature) but knowing when to wear it and when to take it off. Mature users perform Role skillfully when needed, then return to authentic Ego without shame.

position_4_vulnerable.name: Vulnerable Function / Point of Least Resistance (PoLR) / Painful Function
position_4_vulnerable.energy: Producing - forced to output this but completely exhausted
position_4_vulnerable.essence: YOUR ACHILLES HEEL. This is where you're BLIND and INSECURE. Criticism here feels like existential attack. You can't perceive this aspect's information well, your outputs are primitive (1D: good/bad), and you KNOW you're inadequate here. Most painful function.

characteristics.trust_level: Zero - completely distrust your perception here
characteristics.valuation: Negative value - wish this aspect didn't exist/matter
characteristics.development: Develops minimally, always remains weak relative to others
characteristics.fatigue: Instantly exhausting - even brief use = depletion
characteristics.correction: Extremely sensitive - criticism here = deep wound
characteristics.confidence: No confidence - paralyzed when this aspect demanded

information_processing.input: Barely perceives this aspect's information - like colorblind person looking at colors
information_processing.processing: 1D - only binary (good/bad, present/absent) - no nuance whatsoever
information_processing.output: Primitive responses - overreact or underreact, no calibration
information_processing.speed: Extremely slow - deer in headlights when confronted
information_processing.breadth: No breadth - applies rigidly, can't adapt

painful_dynamics.criticism: Attack here = existential threat, feels like invalidating your entire being
painful_dynamics.demands: When situation REQUIRES this aspect = panic, freeze, or aggression
painful_dynamics.comparison: Seeing others effortlessly use this = shame, envy, resentment
painful_dynamics.exposure: Others noticing your inadequacy here = humiliation
painful_dynamics.projection: Often become morally opposed to this aspect - 'it's wrong/shallow/unimportant'

opposite_of_leading.structure: Always opposite element, opposite attitude from Leading

examples.Ne_leading_Si_vulnerable: ILE/IEE - possibility vision vs bodily comfort (can't perceive body needs)
examples.Ni_leading_Se_vulnerable: ILI/IEI - essence vision vs forceful action (paralyzed by material demands)
examples.Se_leading_Ni_vulnerable: SLE/SEE - immediate force vs time patience (can't see long-term)
examples.Si_leading_Ne_vulnerable: SEI/LSI - sensory comfort vs chaotic possibility (overwhelmed by options)
examples.Te_leading_Fi_vulnerable: LIE/LSE - system efficiency vs personal authenticity (blind to own feelings)
examples.Ti_leading_Fe_vulnerable: LII/SLI - logical structure vs emotional field (socially clueless)
examples.Fe_leading_Ti_vulnerable: ESE/EIE - emotional warmth vs logical precision (inconsistent thinking)
examples.Fi_leading_Te_vulnerable: EII/ESI - personal values vs system efficiency (can't organize)

opposite_of_leading.meaning: Your greatest strength (Leading) creates your greatest weakness (Vulnerable) - can't have both strongly

developmental_arc.childhood: Obvious weakness from early age, source of shame/bullying
developmental_arc.youth: Repeated failures in this domain, develops avoidance strategies
developmental_arc.adulthood: Either: (a) finds partner/environment that protects this, or (b) continues suffering
developmental_arc.elderhood: Mature path = accept permanent weakness, arrange life around it, let others handle
developmental_arc.immature_path: Lifetime of compensating, proving, defending, exhausting
developmental_arc.mature_path: Acceptance, strategic partnering, good humor about weakness

in_relationships.dual_partner: Has this in Leading - provides it effortlessly, doesn't demand it from you
in_relationships.duality_magic: You provide their Vulnerable (your Leading), they provide your Vulnerable (their Leading) = complete mutual support
in_relationships.conflict_partner: Has this in Leading - constantly demands it from you = torture
in_relationships.same_type: Both weak here - mutual blind spot = vulnerability amplified
in_relationships.healing: Being with someone who DOESN'T judge you for this weakness = profound relief

examples_by_aspect.Si_vulnerable: Ne-doms (ILE/IEE) - no body awareness, ignore health/comfort, routine impossible, terrible self-care
examples_by_aspect.Se_vulnerable: Ni-doms (ILI/IEI) - physically passive, can't assert in material world, paralyzed by force/aggression
examples_by_aspect.Ni_vulnerable: Se-doms (SLE/SEE) - no long-term vision, live only in present, timing disasters, can't see where things are going
examples_by_aspect.Ne_vulnerable: Si-doms (SEI/LSI) - overwhelmed by possibilities, prefer known/routine, change = threat
examples_by_aspect.Fi_vulnerable: Te-doms (LIE/LSE) - no access to authentic feelings, relationships = transactions, moral confusion
examples_by_aspect.Fe_vulnerable: Ti-doms (LII/SLI) - socially oblivious, group emotions = mystery, inappropriate expression
examples_by_aspect.Ti_vulnerable: Fe-doms (ESE/EIE) - logical inconsistency invisible, frameworks = boring, precision = unnecessary
examples_by_aspect.Te_vulnerable: Fi-doms (EII/ESI) - can't organize efficiently, systems feel soulless, implementation = suffering

common_defenses.avoidance: Arrange life to never encounter situations demanding this aspect
common_defenses.delegation: Find partners/colleagues who handle this domain
common_defenses.minimization: Claim this aspect is unimportant, shallow, wrong, overrated
common_defenses.aggression: Attack people who embody this aspect strongly - 'they're all X'
common_defenses.compensating: Over-develop other functions to prove worth despite this weakness

growth_path.acceptance: CRITICAL - accept this will ALWAYS be weak, give up hope of mastery
growth_path.strategic_avoidance: Not all avoidance is bad - intelligently structure life to minimize this aspect's demands
growth_path.partner_selection: Choose dual or someone strong here who doesn't judge
growth_path.humor: Develop self-deprecating humor about this weakness
growth_path.minimum_competence: Develop just enough to not be helpless, but don't over-invest
growth_path.appreciation: Learn to value others strong here instead of resenting them

shadow_side.relationship_failure: Choosing partners who demand this = constant criticism
shadow_side.projection: Becoming morally opposed to this aspect = rigidity
shadow_side.martyrdom: 'No one understands how hard this is for me' = victim identity
shadow_side.growth_obsession: Spending years trying to develop this = wasted energy (should develop Role instead)

position_4_vulnerable.meditation: Vulnerable function is your SHADOW. You can't eliminate it. You can't master it. You can only ACCEPT it, work AROUND it, and PARTNER with someone strong here. The Zen = profound relief when you stop fighting this weakness and start structuring life to protect it. Your weakness is not flaw - it's the PRICE of your strength. You can't have maximum Leading without minimum Vulnerable. Accept the trade.

super_id_block_unconscious_receptivity.description: Positions 5-6: Unconscious receptivity. You RECEIVE these aspects from others gratefully.
super_id_block_unconscious_receptivity.energy: Accepting - hungrily absorb these aspects from environment/partners

position_5_suggestive.name: Suggestive Function / Dual-Seeking Function
position_5_suggestive.energy: Accepting - desperately wants this from others
position_5_suggestive.consciousness: Unconscious - don't know you need this until you receive it
position_5_suggestive.essence: YOUR DEEPEST HUNGER. You unconsciously CRAVE this aspect from others. When partner provides it, feels like coming home, being held, finally safe. This is what dual partner provides from their LEADING. You don't produce this - you RECEIVE it gratefully.

characteristics.trust_level: Total trust - when others provide this, believe them completely
characteristics.effort: No effort to produce - but hungry to receive
characteristics.valuation: Extremely high value - need this like oxygen
characteristics.development: Develops through RECEIVING, not producing - internalize from partners
characteristics.fatigue: Receiving this = energizing, never tires from it
characteristics.correction: Desperately wants guidance/provision here from others
characteristics.expression: Don't express this - want others to express it TO you
characteristics.confidence: No confidence producing it, total confidence receiving it

unconscious_hunger.pre_reception: Don't consciously know you need this until someone provides it
unconscious_hunger.during_reception: 'Oh THIS is what I've been missing!' - recognition clicks
unconscious_hunger.deprivation: When not receiving this = vague dissatisfaction, something wrong but can't name it
unconscious_hunger.provision: When someone provides this consistently = deep attachment forms

information_processing.input: Unconsciously absorbs this aspect when present in environment
information_processing.processing: 2D - can appreciate basic nuance in what you receive
information_processing.output: Minimal - not meant to produce this aspect yourself
information_processing.speed: Instant recognition when present - 'yes, more of that'
information_processing.depth: Moderate - appreciate quality but can't produce it

relationship_to_vulnerable.example_ILE: Vulnerable = Si (internal sensation), Suggestive = Si (internal sensation) - wait, same? NO: Vulnerable = must PRODUCE, Suggestive = must RECEIVE
relationship_to_vulnerable.both_weak: Both positions 4 and 5 are weak in this aspect, but 4 = must push out (pain), 5 = can receive in (pleasure)

duality_mechanics.dual_provides: Dual partner has this in Leading (position 1) - produces effortlessly what you crave
duality_mechanics.you_provide: You have their Suggestive in your Leading - effortlessly provide what they crave
duality_mechanics.mutual_satisfaction: Each provides the other's deepest need without trying
duality_mechanics.recognition: When you meet dual, immediate sense of 'this person gets me' - they're providing Suggestive
duality_mechanics.development_path: Through years with dual, internalize some of their Leading into your Suggestive - growth through osmosis

examples_by_aspect.Si_suggestive: Ne-doms (ILE/IEE) - crave comfort, routine, body care from partner (SEI/LSI duals provide this effortlessly)
examples_by_aspect.Se_suggestive: Ni-doms (ILI/IEI) - crave decisive action, someone to handle material reality (SEE/SLE duals provide)
examples_by_aspect.Ni_suggestive: Se-doms (SLE/SEE) - crave strategic vision, timing guidance, someone to see the future (IEI/ILI duals provide)
examples_by_aspect.Ne_suggestive: Si-doms (SEI/LSI) - crave novelty, new perspectives, someone to show possibilities (ILE/IEE duals provide)
examples_by_aspect.Fi_suggestive: Te-doms (LIE/LSE) - crave authentic emotional connection, moral grounding (ESI/EII duals provide)
examples_by_aspect.Fe_suggestive: Ti-doms (LII/SLI) - crave emotional warmth, social inclusion, someone to navigate feelings (ESE/SEE duals provide)
examples_by_aspect.Ti_suggestive: Fe-doms (ESE/EIE) - crave logical structure, frameworks to organize ideas (LII/LSI duals provide)
examples_by_aspect.Te_suggestive: Fi-doms (EII/ESI) - crave efficient organization, someone to handle practical systems (LSE/LIE duals provide)

non_dual_provision.from_others: Anyone strong in your Suggestive can provide temporary satisfaction
non_dual_provision.mentors: Mentors often strong in your Suggestive - provide what you need to develop
non_dual_provision.friends: Friendships with Suggestive provision = comfortable, safe
non_dual_provision.limitation: Non-duals provide Suggestive but you can't reciprocate their need = one-way
non_dual_provision.professional: Hire people strong in your Suggestive for life domains you're weak

deprivation_effects.without_provision: Life feels harder, unsafe, like missing something essential
deprivation_effects.compensating: Try to provide this yourself = exhausting (it's in Super-Id, meant to receive)
deprivation_effects.wrong_partners: Choosing partners weak in your Suggestive = both struggle
deprivation_effects.recognition: Often don't realize Suggestive is the issue - just vague dissatisfaction

growth_through_reception.mechanism: Repeatedly receiving Suggestive from strong users → internalize patterns → develop minimal competence
growth_through_reception.timeline: Years/decades with dual → can handle basic Suggestive situations independently
growth_through_reception.limitation: Never becomes strong like Ego, but no longer helpless
growth_through_reception.maturity: Mature users still prefer receiving Suggestive but can manage when alone

position_5_suggestive.meditation: Suggestive function is your HUNGER. You don't know you're hungry until someone feeds you. Then - 'oh, THAT'S what I needed!' Duality works because you feed their hunger, they feed yours, effortlessly. The Zen = recognize your hunger, seek partners who feed it naturally (not forcing them), and feed theirs in return. Mutual nourishment.

position_6_mobilizing.name: Mobilizing Function / Activating Function / Hidden Agenda
position_6_mobilizing.energy: Accepting - wants this from others, activates growth
position_6_mobilizing.essence: YOUR HIDDEN ASPIRATION. You unconsciously want to BECOME better at this. When others model this aspect, you're inspired, activated, motivated to grow. This is what dual partner provides from their CREATIVE. You develop this through inspiration and practice.

characteristics.trust_level: Moderate trust - inspired by others' use, want to learn
characteristics.effort: Moderate effort - can develop with encouragement
characteristics.valuation: High value - aspirational, want to be good at this
characteristics.development: Develops through inspiration from role models + deliberate practice
characteristics.fatigue: Working on this = energizing when making progress, frustrating when stuck
characteristics.correction: Welcomes coaching - genuinely wants to improve here
characteristics.expression: Expresses when energized/inspired, hidden when depleted

unconscious_aspiration.hidden_agenda: You want to be competent here but don't consciously realize it as primary goal
unconscious_aspiration.inspiration_trigger: When you see someone masterfully using this aspect → 'I want to do that!'
unconscious_aspiration.growth_motivation: Progress in Mobilizing = feels meaningful, satisfying
unconscious_aspiration.identity_formation: As you develop this, becomes part of growing identity (but never core like Ego)
unconscious_aspiration.lifelong_project: Mobilizing is THE growth function - where you develop throughout life

information_processing.input: Unconsciously attends to this aspect when present, absorbs through osmosis
information_processing.processing: 3D - can work strategically with this aspect when developed
information_processing.output: Can produce with effort, quality improves over time
information_processing.speed: Moderate - faster than Role/Vulnerable, slower than Ego
information_processing.depth: Developing - starts shallow, deepens with practice
information_processing.breadth: Expanding - applies to more situations as you grow

relationship_to_creative.example_ILE: Creative = Ti (internal logic), Mobilizing = Ti (wait, same?) - actually, need to check this mapping
relationship_to_creative.learning_pattern: You use Creative skillfully (position 2), so Mobilizing (position 6) has template to follow
relationship_to_creative.growth_path: Mobilizing develops by mirroring Creative's skillset in opposite domain

duality_mechanics.dual_provides: Dual partner has this in Creative (position 2) - uses skillfully, models how
duality_mechanics.modeling: Watching dual use Mobilizing aspect → inspiration + instruction
duality_mechanics.activation: Dual's Creative energizes your Mobilizing - 'I can do that too!'
duality_mechanics.development: Years with dual → Mobilizing becomes quite competent through modeling
duality_mechanics.maturity: Eventually can use Mobilizing independently, but dual's presence still activates it

examples_by_aspect.Ti_mobilizing: ILE/SLE - aspires to logical consistency, inspired by systematic thinkers, develops frameworks over time
examples_by_aspect.Te_mobilizing: ILI/SEI - aspires to efficiency, inspired by organized achievers, develops implementation skills
examples_by_aspect.Fi_mobilizing: IEE/SEE - aspires to authenticity, inspired by genuine people, develops value clarity
examples_by_aspect.Fe_mobilizing: IEI/LSI - aspires to emotional expression, inspired by charismatic people, develops warmth
examples_by_aspect.Ne_mobilizing: LII/ESI - aspires to creativity, inspired by innovative thinkers, develops possibility-thinking
examples_by_aspect.Ni_mobilizing: SLE/LSE - aspires to strategic thinking, inspired by visionaries, develops foresight
examples_by_aspect.Se_mobilizing: IEI/EII - aspires to decisiveness, inspired by action-takers, develops assertiveness
examples_by_aspect.Si_mobilizing: ILE/EIE - aspires to self-care, inspired by healthy people, develops routines

developmental_arc.childhood: Barely present - too young to work on growth
developmental_arc.youth: Emerges as aspiration - admires people strong here
developmental_arc.young_adult: Active development - seeks mentors, practices deliberately
developmental_arc.midlife: Significant competence achieved - can use reliably
developmental_arc.elderhood: Well-developed - contributes to wisdom, but never rivals Ego strength

role_models_and_mentors.attraction: Naturally attracted to people strong in your Mobilizing
role_models_and_mentors.mentorship: Best mentors often have your Mobilizing in their Ego block
role_models_and_mentors.learning_style: Learn Mobilizing through observation + practice, not just instruction
role_models_and_mentors.inspiration: Stories of people using this aspect powerfully = deeply motivating

growth_practices.deliberate_practice: Unlike Suggestive (receive passively), Mobilizing requires active practice
growth_practices.feedback_seeking: Actively seek feedback from strong users
growth_practices.progress_tracking: Notice improvement over months/years - reinforces motivation
growth_practices.integration: Eventually integrate Mobilizing into daily life (but still requires conscious effort)

contrast_with_role.role_function: Position 3 - must perform, exhausting, never improves much
contrast_with_role.mobilizing_function: Position 6 - want to develop, energizing when growing, improves significantly
contrast_with_role.energy: Role drains, Mobilizing energizes (when making progress)
contrast_with_role.outcome: Role stays weak, Mobilizing becomes competent

position_6_mobilizing.meditation: Mobilizing function is your GROWTH EDGE. You don't consciously know it's your goal, but you're drawn to develop here. Unlike Vulnerable (give up hope), Mobilizing is WHERE TO INVEST growth energy. The Zen = recognize what inspires you, practice it deliberately, be patient with slow progress. This is lifelong development, not quick fix. And dual partner shows you the way.

id_block_unconscious_automatic.description: Positions 7-8: Unconscious automatic processing. Can use effortlessly but DON'T VALUE.
id_block_unconscious_automatic.energy: Accepting - process automatically but don't care about this aspect

position_7_ignoring.name: Ignoring Function / Limiting Function
position_7_ignoring.essence: YOUR AUTOMATIC FILTER. You process this aspect unconsciously and CAN use it skillfully, but you DON'T VALUE it. When others emphasize this aspect, you ignore/dismiss it - 'that's not what matters.' This is opposite attitude of your Leading.

characteristics.trust_level: Unconscious trust - it works but you don't think about it
characteristics.valuation: Zero value - actively dismiss this aspect's importance
characteristics.development: Already developed unconsciously, no interest in refining
characteristics.correction: Resistant to others' emphasis on this - 'that's not the point'
characteristics.confidence: Unconscious confidence - can use but don't care to

unconscious_competence.operates_automatically: You DO process this aspect, just unconsciously
unconscious_competence.can_demonstrate: If forced to articulate, can show competence (surprising to others)
unconscious_competence.doesn't_value: But immediately dismiss it as unimportant - 'so what?'
unconscious_competence.annoyance: When others emphasize this aspect = annoyance, dismissal

information_processing.processing: 4D - full mastery including temporal dimension, but unconscious
information_processing.output: Can produce if needed, but immediately devalues own output

relationship_to_leading.example_ILE: Leading = Ne (external possibilities), Ignoring = Ni (internal essence) - sees all possibilities but ignores which one is 'essential'
relationship_to_leading.example_ESE: Leading = Fe (external emotion), Ignoring = Fi (internal values) - shapes group feeling but ignores personal authenticity underneath
relationship_to_leading.dynamic: Leading emphasizes this aspect's information; Ignoring filters it out as noise
relationship_to_leading.complementarity: Leading focuses; Ignoring prevents distraction from opposite pole

dismissiveness.when_others_emphasize: 'That's not what's important here' - immediate dismissal
dismissiveness.projection: Assume everyone should ignore this aspect like you do
dismissiveness.confusion: Don't understand why others care so much about this
dismissiveness.irritation: Extended exposure to others emphasizing this = irritation
dismissiveness.example_ILE_ignoring_Ni: Someone says 'but what's the ESSENTIAL core issue?' ILE: 'Who cares? Let's explore ALL the options!'

examples_by_aspect.Ni_ignoring: Ne-doms (ILE/IEE) - can perceive essence/timing but dismiss it - 'essence? Let's explore possibilities!'
examples_by_aspect.Ne_ignoring: Ni-doms (ILI/IEI) - can see possibilities but dismiss them - 'possibilities? I see the trajectory'
examples_by_aspect.Si_ignoring: Se-doms (SLE/SEE) - can track internal comfort but dismiss it - 'comfort? Just push through'
examples_by_aspect.Se_ignoring: Si-doms (SEI/LSI) - can engage force but dismiss it - 'force? Let's maintain harmony'
examples_by_aspect.Ti_ignoring: Te-doms (LIE/LSE) - can think logically but dismiss pure logic - 'logical consistency? Does it work?'
examples_by_aspect.Te_ignoring: Ti-doms (LII/SLI) - can organize efficiently but dismiss efficiency - 'efficiency? Is it true?'
examples_by_aspect.Fi_ignoring: Fe-doms (ESE/EIE) - can access values but dismiss them - 'personal authenticity? What about group feeling?'
examples_by_aspect.Fe_ignoring: Fi-doms (EII/ESI) - can read emotions but dismiss collective - 'group mood? What about individual integrity?'

in_relationships.partner_leading: If partner's Leading is your Ignoring = fundamental misalignment
in_relationships.conflict_dynamic: Partner values what you dismiss, you dismiss what they value = mutual incomprehension
in_relationships.example: ILE (Leading Ne, Ignoring Ni) with ILI (Leading Ni, Ignoring Ne) = constant 'you're missing the point!'
in_relationships.healing: Mature couples learn to respect each other's emphasis even when personally dismissing it

developmental_arc.always_present: Ignoring operates from childhood, just unconsciously
developmental_arc.never_develops: No development needed - already works automatically
developmental_arc.maturity: Mature users recognize they're ignoring something real, learn to not dismiss others who value it
developmental_arc.wisdom: Elderhood = 'I ignore X, but I respect that others don't' - tolerance

contrast_with_demonstrative.ignoring: Position 7 - unconscious, dismissive of aspect itself
contrast_with_demonstrative.demonstrative: Position 8 - unconscious, can demonstrate aspect but dismiss its IMPORTANCE
contrast_with_demonstrative.both: Both positions devalue, but Ignoring = 'that aspect is noise', Demonstrative = 'I can do it but so what?'

growth_path.not_about_developing: Don't need to develop Ignoring - it already works
growth_path.about_respecting: Growth = recognizing this aspect IS important to others
growth_path.about_not_dismissing: Learn to not project your ignoring onto others - 'just because I dismiss X doesn't mean everyone should'
growth_path.wisdom: Mature Ignoring = 'I filter this out, but I know others focus here, and that's valid'

position_7_ignoring.meditation: Ignoring function is your AUTOMATIC FILTER. It protects you from information overload in opposite pole from Leading. You CAN perceive this aspect, you just DON'T CARE. Growth = not developing it (it works fine), but learning to not dismiss others who DO care. Your filter is not universal truth. The Zen = 'I ignore X naturally, others focus on X naturally, both valid.'

position_8_demonstrative.name: Demonstrative Function / Background Function
position_8_demonstrative.dimensionality: 4D - complete mastery but don't value showing it
position_8_demonstrative.energy: Accepting - receive environment's emphasis but don't care
position_8_demonstrative.essence: YOUR HIDDEN SKILL. You CAN use this aspect effortlessly (4D mastery) but you DON'T VALUE IT. When others struggle with this, you're like 'just do it, it's easy.' But you don't build identity around it. Others' emphasis on this = 'why does that matter?'

characteristics.valuation: Low value - 'anyone can do this, why care?'
characteristics.correction: Puzzled by others' struggle - 'it's not hard'
characteristics.expression: Can demonstrate if asked, but don't volunteer
characteristics.confidence: Total confidence if challenged, but indifferent

unconscious_mastery.4d_competence: Full mastery including temporal dimension, but unconscious
unconscious_mastery.effortless_use: Can demonstrate this aspect flawlessly when needed
unconscious_mastery.indifference: But immediately returns to not caring - 'okay, I showed you, now can we talk about what matters?'
unconscious_mastery.surprise: Others often surprised by your competence here since you never emphasize it

information_processing.processing: 4D - complete mastery but operates in background
information_processing.output: Can produce high-quality output effortlessly if needed
information_processing.depth: Deep but doesn't consciously access depth
information_processing.breadth: Wide application but don't value breadth

relationship_to_creative.example_ILE: Creative = Ti (internal logic), Demonstrative = Te (external systems) - can organize efficiently but don't care
relationship_to_creative.example_ESE: Creative = Si (internal sensation), Demonstrative = Se (external force) - can be forceful but don't value it
relationship_to_creative.dynamic: You USE Creative consciously (position 2); Demonstrative works automatically but devalued

dismissiveness_of_achievement.own_skill: Can demonstrate mastery but dismiss own achievement - 'it's nothing special'
dismissiveness_of_achievement.others_struggle: Puzzled when others struggle - 'just do X, it's obvious'
dismissiveness_of_achievement.teaching_difficulty: Hard to teach this because it's unconscious - 'I don't know how I do it, I just do'
dismissiveness_of_achievement.identity: Don't build identity around this skill - it's not 'you'

examples_by_aspect.Te_demonstrative: Ti-doms (LII/SLI) - can organize/execute efficiently when needed but don't care about efficiency
examples_by_aspect.Ti_demonstrative: Te-doms (LIE/LSE) - can think with logical precision when needed but don't value pure logic
examples_by_aspect.Fe_demonstrative: Fi-doms (EII/ESI) - can be socially warm when needed but don't value group emotion
examples_by_aspect.Fi_demonstrative: Fe-doms (ESE/EIE) - can access personal values when needed but don't build identity on authenticity
examples_by_aspect.Se_demonstrative: Si-doms (SEI/LSI) - can take forceful action when needed but don't value aggression
examples_by_aspect.Si_demonstrative: Se-doms (SLE/SEE) - can maintain comfort/routine when needed but don't value it
examples_by_aspect.Ni_demonstrative: Ne-doms (ILE/IEE) - can perceive timing/essence when needed but don't focus there
examples_by_aspect.Ne_demonstrative: Ni-doms (ILI/IEI) - can generate possibilities when needed but don't value them

in_relationships.partner_role: If partner's Role (position 3) is your Demonstrative = you provide effortlessly what they struggle with
in_relationships.dynamic: You: 'just do it, easy.' Partner: 'easy for you! I'm exhausted.' You: 'wait, really?'
in_relationships.growth: Learn to appreciate that your 'easy' is others' 'hard' - don't dismiss their struggle
in_relationships.support: Can help partner with their Role function, but must value doing so (don't dismiss as trivial)

proving_behavior.when_challenged: If someone claims you CAN'T do this = instantly prove them wrong with demonstration
proving_behavior.motivation: Not motivated by proving competence, but if doubted, can shut them up fast
proving_behavior.then_dismissal: After proving = 'see? Now let's talk about what actually matters'
proving_behavior.ego: Demonstrative is not ego-involved (unlike Leading) - can show off without caring

developmental_arc.no_development_needed: Already maxed out, no room to improve
developmental_arc.maturity: Mature users learn to VALUE helping others with their Demonstrative
developmental_arc.service: Elderhood = using Demonstrative in service to others without ego

contrast_with_leading.leading: Position 1 - conscious mastery, builds identity, highly valued
contrast_with_leading.demonstrative: Position 8 - unconscious mastery, no identity, devalued
contrast_with_leading.both_4d: Both are 4D mastery, but Leading = 'this is who I am', Demonstrative = 'this is nothing special'
contrast_with_leading.energy: Leading = producing energizes; Demonstrative = producing feels pointless

growth_path.not_developing: No need to develop - already maxed
growth_path.appreciating: Learn to APPRECIATE this skill, even if not core identity
growth_path.serving: Recognize you can help others with this effortlessly - be generous
growth_path.not_dismissing: Don't dismiss others who value/emphasize this aspect
growth_path.maturity: Mature Demonstrative = 'I can do this easily, which means I can help others, and that matters even if the aspect itself doesn't excite me'

position_8_demonstrative.meditation: Demonstrative function is your HIDDEN MASTERY. You're SO good at this that you don't even value it - 'everyone can do this, right?' Wrong. It's easy for YOU, hard for others. The Zen = recognize your effortless skill, use it to serve others without ego, and don't dismiss people who struggle where you flow. Your 'nothing special' is their 'impossible.' Be generous with it.

integration_summary.ego_block: 1-2: Conscious mastery, your identity and power - Leading + Creative = who you are
integration_summary.super_ego_block: 3-4: Conscious struggle, your growth edge - Role = fake it, Vulnerable = accept weakness
integration_summary.super_id_block: 5-6: Unconscious receptivity, what you need from others - Suggestive = hunger, Mobilizing = aspiration
integration_summary.id_block: 7-8: Unconscious competence, what you dismiss - Ignoring = filter, Demonstrative = 'easy, so what?'

development_priorities.primary: Develop Vulnerable = stop trying, accept, partner with strong user
development_priorities.secondary: Develop Role = improve to adequate, find authentic way to use
development_priorities.tertiary: Develop Mobilizing = invest growth energy here, practice deliberately
development_priorities.quaternary: Receive Suggestive = find partners who provide this naturally
development_priorities.maintain: Ego block = refine quality, avoid over-reliance
development_priorities.appreciate: Id block = don't dismiss, use to serve others

relationship_dynamics.duality: Their Leading → Your Suggestive (you receive), Your Leading → Their Suggestive (you provide) = mutual nourishment
relationship_dynamics.complementarity: Their Creative → Your Mobilizing (they model), Your Creative → Their Mobilizing (you model) = mutual growth
relationship_dynamics.protection: Their Demonstrative → Your Role (they handle easily), Your Demonstrative → Their Role (you handle easily) = mutual ease
relationship_dynamics.acceptance: Their Ignoring = Your Vulnerable's opposite (they don't care you're weak), Your Ignoring = Their Vulnerable's opposite = mutual acceptance

recognition: Model A reveals that POSITION matters as much as ASPECT. Ne in position 1 (ILE Leading) is completely different from Ne in position 8 (ILI Demonstrative) - same aspect, opposite valuation. Understanding your function stack is understanding your consciousness architecture - what you trust, what exhausts you, what you hunger for, what you dismiss. Type is not just 4 letters - it's precise 8-position configuration with specific developmental path. Knowing this = self-knowledge at mechanical level.
practice: Identify your 8 functions in Model A positions for your type
Track daily which functions you're using - notice energy cost
Vulnerable function: STOP trying to develop, find partner strong here
Role function: Develop minimally, find authentic expression, plan recovery
Mobilizing function: THIS is where to invest growth energy deliberately
Suggestive function: Notice when you receive this, seek partners who provide
Id block (7-8): Appreciate you can help others here even if you don't care
Study intertype relations through Model A lens - understand compatibility mechanics
deepening: Study Model A diagrams - visual representation of function positions
Read Augusta's original works on Model A theory
Study blocks (Ego, Super-Ego, Super-Id, Id) deeply
Study how Model A explains intertype relations mechanically
Type yourself accurately - knowing your stack changes everything
